name: True Fear: Forsaken Souls - A Scary Hidden Object Mystery
name_original: True Fear: Forsaken Souls - A Scary Hidden Object Mystery
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

What if everything you knew about your life, everything your family ever told you, turned out to be a lie? A strange midnight visitor could change your life forever… Find out the truth about your past in this chilling and exciting Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure Game!

• EVERY FAMILY HAS SKELETONS
A strange man at your door delivers a letter from your estranged sister Heather.

• REUNITE WITH YOUR LONG LOST SISTER
Your sister disappeared ten years ago, and now she’s calling you to a place filled with bad omens.

• EXPLORE THE DARK FALLS ASYLUM
Navigate through the eerie abandoned asylum while solving challenging mini-games and puzzles. Find clues in hidden object scenes to reveal a dark and disturbing family secret!

• UNCOVER MORE SECRETS IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
There are 15 statues to collect, each with their own unique stories and many achievements to earn throughout the game! Plus, enjoy spine-chilling wallpapers and concept art!
